User manually

User guide

There are several mode in Web-BAMT:

  1. Example

    Here user can check an example of pretrained network and its parameters.

  2. Experiment

    Here user can train bayessian network. With training Web-BAMT samples from network. To tune init_edges user can click on “Start edges” button. Clicking on one node and then on another one build an edge between them. To delete edge user can just click on it.

  3. Sample

    Here user can comapare real data and sample data. To do this, user can click on node, and down below will be sampled data for it.
